requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X1600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2006 or newer graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2006 or newer graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i3+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 640
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any, windows media player required

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
